snippet.title: Anomaly Escape - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2900600/Anomaly_Escape/

The time has come at the beginning of April. Z-Tech Studio brings the first game to Steam. Since games like Exit8, Station 5 and Project 13 are well received, now comes Anomaly Escape. It's a normal exit game, but nothing happens on the spaceship without a reason. This will be clarified more and more in the upcoming sequel and prequel games (First Person Shooter Story Game). 
If you want to support the Anomaly Saga, follow us everywhere and leave the love.


What is Anomaly Escape about?
In Anomaly Escape, you're on a spaceship with activated self-destruct. Navigate Corridors 0-10, watch for anomalies, solve puzzles. In multiplayer, teamwork is crucial for survival and saving the ship. Beware: failure means restarting from Corridor 0.
